title: BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets
text:
BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 24, 2019 07:10)

BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets Sept 24 (Reuters) - Appsvillage Australia Ltd :

* EXPANDED ITS FACEBOOK ADVERTISING OFFERING TO A RANGE OF

EMERGING MARKETS INCLUDING PHILIPPINES, INDIA, MALAYSIA



Source text for Eikon: ID:nASX37TcSC

Further company coverage: APV.AX





BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets
description: BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets
